Name: Get ECU Info
Description: Retrieves hardware and firmware information from the ECU.

Name: Get Object List (Tables/Drivers)
Description: Retrieves a list of all available Tables and Drivers from the ECU.

Name: Get DataLink List
Description: Retrieves a list of all available DataLinks from the ECU.

Name: Get Single DataLink Value
Description: Reads and displays the current value for a single DataLink.

Name: Get Table by ID
Description: Retrieves a full data table from the ECU.

Name: Get Driver by ID
Description: Retrieves a full driver configuration from the ECU.

Name: Start Real-time Data Stream
Description: Starts a continuous stream of all DataLink values.

Name: Update Table by ID
Description: Updates a full data table on the ECU.

Name: Store Table by ID
Description: Saves a table to the ECU's non-volatile memory.

Name: Update Driver by ID
Description: Updates a full driver configuration on the ECU.

Name: Store Driver by ID
Description: Saves a driver to the ECU's non-volatile memory.

Name: Import Definitions from File
Description: Parses an XML definition file and merges it into the local store.
